name: blackcurrant
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] a small, round, dark purple fruit that grows on a bush and is usually cooked before being eaten: Frozen blackcurrants are in the supermarket all year round. The wine had an aroma of blackcurrant. blackcurrant jam
Creativ Studio Heinemann/GettyImages
[ C ] the bush on which blackcurrants (= small, round, dark purple fruit) grow: The blackcurrant grows extensively in Tierra del Fuego and Patagonia. Blackcurrants are more tolerant of heavy and alkaline soils than other currants.
[ U ] UK a drink made by adding water to a very strong liquid made from blackcurrants (= small, round, dark purple fruit) and sugar or sweetener, or the strong liquid itself: I drank a pint of blackcurrant and still felt thirsty. a bottle of blackcurrant
